## Introduction

## Outline

We're going to learn how to make a variety of static and interactive plots in R:

This module is an overview of:
  
- [ggplot2](http://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/)
- [Trelliscope](http://deltarho.org/)
- [htmlwidgets](http://www.htmlwidgets.org/)
- [plotly](https://plot.ly/r/)
- [Shiny](http://shiny.rstudio.com/)
- [dygraph](https://rstudio.github.io/dygraphs/)

Alongside this module are two activites: 

- [ggplot2](./module-1-ggplot2.Rmd)
- [Shiny](./module-2-shiny.Rmd)

## Learning outcomes

After completing this module, 

Students should be able to:

- Make simple to intermediate plots in R using ggplot2
- Make a simple Shiny app

and students should have an awareness of the great number of visualization tools provided in R and what they're useful for.
